remarks: Initial expression of Diophantine property of a set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)

eldiophb $p |- ( D e. ( Dioph ` N ) <-> ( N e. NN0 /\ E. k e. ( ZZ>= ` N ) E. p e. ( mzPoly ` ( 1 ... k ) ) D = { t | E. u e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... k ) ) ( t = ( u |` ( 1 ... N ) ) /\ ( p ` u ) = 0 ) } ) ) $.
$d D k p $.
$d N k p t u $.
